text: 9|114|Arau ibraahime te'omra pitrra babe ksama praarthana karaichila eta pratisrautira karane, tara pichata yetiya e'ito te'omra ocarata spasta haâ€™la ye, si allahara satrau tetiya ibraahime tara lagata samparka bichinna karaile. Niscaya ibraahima achila adhika komala hrdayara adhikarai, sahanasila.
